title: How Plastic Became a Plague - Scientific American
body: Earth Has a Hidden Plastic Problem—Scientists Are Hunting It Down. Trillions of tiny particles generated by our plastic-reliant society are polluting environments worldwide. August 13, 2018 ...
readable_content: Scientific American (2023-12-08): The article pertains to the pervasive issue of plastic pollution, with multiple sections covering various aspects such as the presence of microplastics in the Arctic, the impact on animals and humans, and the need for fundamental changes in dealing with plastic waste. The writing explores the reach and consequences of this pollution in different environments and ecosystems.
summary:
